snippet: Tebow, the former N.F.L. quarterback who signed a minor league deal with the Mets this month, reported to Port St. Lucie, Fla., on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Tebow, the former N.F.L. quarterback who signed a minor league deal with the Mets this month, reported to Port St. Lucie, Fla., on Monday.
abstract: Tim Tebow arrives at New York Mets minor league facility in Florida for his first workout in instructional league camp to cheers from around 400 fans; arrival is covered by over 70 members of news media, creating kind of spectacle at facility that is very rare for minor league players.

headline.main: Tim Tebow, Wearing No. 15, Participates in First Mets Workout
headline.print_headline: Starting at Bottom, With a Cheering Section
